= Introduction =

This page lists methods to build Monosim on Linux and Windows os.

= Build on Linux =

== Build and install from tarballs ==

Can find tarballs in [http://code.google.com/p/monosim/downloads/list Downloads area].

=== For monosim-gtk ===

Build Dependencies:
 * mono devel package
 * log4net devel package
 * comex-base devel (see [http://code.google.com/p/comex-project/Wiki/Build_Comex comex-base build])
 * gtk-sharp2 devel package
 * glade-sharp2

To build and install can use:
{{{ 
 $ ./configure
 $ make
 # make install (as root)
}}}
----

=== For monosim-qt ===

Build Dependencies:
 * mono devel package
 * log4net devel package
 * comex-base devel (see [http://code.google.com/p/comex-project/Wiki/Build_Comex comex-base build])
 * qyoto devel package
 * qyoto

To build and install can use:
{{{ 
 $ ./configure
 $ make
 # make install (as root)
}}}

<br />


== Build from sources ==
Need to obtain sources using checkout instructions contained in [http://code.google.com/p/monosim/source/checkout Source Tabs].

=== For monosim-gtk ===

Build Dependencies:
 * mono devel package
 * log4net devel package
 * comex-base devel (see [http://code.google.com/p/comex-project/Wiki/Build_Comex comex-base build])
 * gtk-sharp2 devel package
 * glade-sharp2

To build can use build script:
{{{ 
 $ ./build-lnx-monosim-gtk.sh
}}}
build output will be generated in monosim-gtk/bin/Debug folder
----

=== For monosim-qt ===

Build Dependencies:
 * mono devel package
 * log4net devel package
 * comex-base devel (see [http://code.google.com/p/comex-project/Wiki/Build_Comex comex-base build])
 * qyoto devel devel package
 * qyoto

To build can use build script:
{{{ 
 $ ./build-lnx-monosim-qt.sh
}}}
build output will be generated in monosim-qt/bin/Debug folder


<br />


= Build on Windows =

== Build from sources ==
Need to obtain sources using checkout instructions contained in [http://code.google.com/p/monosim/source/checkout Source Tabs].


After can use [http://sharpdevelop.net/opensource/sd/ SharpDevelop IDE] to build all solutions. Note that you need to change reference to comex-base and log4net because default reference is in GAC.
